mainTitleContents.title: The Goal
mainTitleContents.text:
Focus on the health benefits you need.
Balanced nutrition will let you achieve them.

mainTitleContents.title: Measure Yourself
mainTitleContents.text: What are your height and body weight?

mainTitleContents.title: Destructive behaviors
mainTitleContents.text: We all have them! Which are yours?

mainTitleContents.title: Physical exercise
mainTitleContents.text:
Physical exercise means a lot for a woman who
wants to lose kilos and works at the office

wrapperTitles: How active are you during the day?
